This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Elements in a shadow tree should be accessible via shadow root's querySelectorAll() DOM tree accessor. 
PASS Elements with a specific class in a shadow tree should be accessible viashadow root's querySelectorAll() DOM tree accessor. 
PASS Elements in a shadow tree should be accessible via shadow root's getElementById() DOM tree accessor. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
